original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽15.58. Savicāraduka, Kusalattika🔽Savicāraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya  sa vicāra duka kusalattika  sa vicāram kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa vicāraḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on the Triad with Non-Causality🔽With-inquiry, etc.

original: Savicāraṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: sa vicāram akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa vicāraḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūlam tīṇi eva paccaya vasena
